basics.name: Jane Doe
basics.label: Node.js Backend Engineer
basics.summary: Highly skilled **Node.js backend engineer** with extensive experience in designing, developing, and deploying scalable services. Proven expertise in **AWS** cloud environments, building robust **backend** solutions, and optimizing application performance.

work.summary: Developed and maintained backend services for various web applications.
highlights: Engineered and maintained high-performance **Node.js backend services** for core applications, handling significant data volumes.
Deployed and managed applications on **AWS**, leveraging services like EC2, Lambda, and S3 for scalable and reliable operations.
Developed and optimized RESTful APIs, ensuring seamless integration with frontend systems and third-party services.
Contributed to architectural decisions for **backend** systems, focusing on microservices patterns and **AWS** best practices.

work.summary: Contributed to the development of internal tools and client projects.
highlights: Developed features for a customer management system using JavaScript.
Wrote unit tests to ensure code quality and maintainability.
Collaborated with senior engineers to implement new functionalities for various client projects.

skills.name: Cloud Platforms
keywords: AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3, DynamoDB, RDS, API Gateway, CloudWatch, IAM)

projects.name: E-commerce Backend Service
projects.description: Developed the backend for a mock e-commerce platform.
highlights: Engineered a scalable **Node.js backend** for a mock e-commerce platform, implementing core services like user authentication, product catalog, and order processing.
Deployed backend services to **AWS EC2 instances**, configuring security groups and load balancing for high availability.
Integrated with third-party payment gateways and utilized **AWS S3** for media storage, enhancing application functionality and scalability.
Designed and optimized MongoDB schema, supporting efficient data retrieval for the **backend** application.

projects.name: Real-time Chat Application
projects.description: Built a real-time chat application with user presence.
highlights: Developed a real-time chat application using **Node.js** and WebSockets, facilitating instant message delivery and user presence functionality.
Configured **AWS Lambda** functions for specific backend logic and managed message persistence using **AWS DynamoDB**, ensuring high throughput and low latency.
Utilized **AWS API Gateway** to expose WebSocket endpoints, providing a scalable entry point for client connections.
